article.title: Cray Inc. Awarded Supercomputing Contract Modification
article.text: Cray Inc., Seattle, was awarded a $26,559,500 modification (P0017) to contract W912DY-13-G-0022 for Department of Defense high-performance computing modernization program purchase of high-performance computing systems, administration and maintenance. Work will be performed in Vicksburg, Mississippi, with an estimated completion date of April 24, 2021. Fiscal 2016 other procurement (Army) funds in the amount of $26,559,500 were obligated at the time of the award. The Army Corps of Engineers, Huntsville, Alabama, is the contracting activity.
